content.prompt:
The Metropolitan Museum of Art/Purchase, Rogers Fund and The Kevorkian Foundation Gift, 1955

In the folio shown, the elaborate border of flowers and birds, rich furniture, and figural composition allows it to be attributed to which of the following cultures?

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
